attributes.action: place an upper limit on petrol and diesel tax at 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The cost of fuel for our vehicles is getting to a ridiculously high level.
This petition is asking that the government puts in place a mechanism where by the absolute maximum amount of tax paid on petrol and diesel is 50%.
This should insure that the price of our fuel is fair.
